name: NecroMadness (SolonWise)
description:
A wise necromancer is studying the dead in order to create a new medicine capable of help a lot of sick people. However, things change once he begins to enjoy the power granted by his own discoveries.

Form a group of up to 4 heroes and help the people of Tal Kumbar to end the necromancer's evil plans in this great dungeon crawler!

- There are 8 playable characters, each one with a different class, skills, talent and attributes.
- You can forge weapons, manufacture equipment, brew medicine and even write magical scrolls.
- You can collect ores, wood, herbs and ancient texts to help you in your mission.
- Use the blessing from ancient gods to strengthen your heroes.
- Venture into a big dungeon with a lot of secrets and items to find.

General tips:

- As any other dungeon crawler, it's important to come back to town from time to time. There, never forget to save the game and buy some medicine. 
- The white plume is a crucial item in this game. Always have at least one in your inventary, as it may save your life.
- Collecting ores and wood is a good way to make money at the begining of the game.
- Choose carefully your Marvel blessings and try to form a balanced group of heroes.
